comment.author: Rebekah
comment.text: (CNN) Several leading Republicans are suggesting that if Hillary Clinton is elected, she could be impeached sometime after inauguration, perhaps in her first year as president.

replies.author: Elise
replies.text: But that will only mean we are stuck with CAIN as president!! No!!!!
